db:abstract.db:para: A Twitter search client with 3D effects.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += quick qml SOURCES += main.cpp RESOURCES += tweetsearch.qrc
OTHER_FILES = tweetsearch.qml \ content/*.qml \ content/*.js \ content/resources/*
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quick/demos/tweetsearch INSTALLS += target
